trans-unit.source: The ColumnClickEventArgs class provides the zero-based index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class of the column that is clicked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ColumnClickEventArgs gir den nullbaserte indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>klassen til kolonnen som klikkes i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne informasjonen i en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>-hendelsen for å finne ut hvilken kolonne klikkes for å utføre oppgaver på dataene i kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for kolonnen som klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter den nullbaserte indeksen for kolonnen som klikkes.

trans-unit.source: You can use the information provided by this property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke informasjonen av denne egenskapen i en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>-hendelsen for å finne ut hvilken kolonne klikkes for å utføre oppgaver på dataene i kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>på kolonnen som klikkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>
